attributes.action: bring the motion to the house that all MP's should resign as and acknowledgement of the betrayal of their positions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I  want this motion taken to the house for members to respond to-those willing to resign and seek re-election are those who are likely to have integrity.There are now no trustworthy MP's in the public's eyes.This betrayal is universal and must be rectified.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
